attributes.action: stop the practice of MPs employing members of their own family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public sector employs an equal opportunities recruitment and employment policy.  However, MPs through employing their own family members do not comply with this policy.

Jobs should be available to the most qualified candidate - not because of the relationship the employee has with the MP.

MP support and consistuency staff should be payrolled as civil servants and remain in post whomever the MP for that constituency is allowing:
* knowledge of the constituency and the running of the office to remain no matter which party holds the constituency seat
* performance management of the individuals - so that poor performance is addressed and constituents are served to the best quality possible
* The best candidate to be able to take up the role

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
